alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued May 07 at 3:13AM CDT until May 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Lake, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Big Sandy Lake and, East Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally dense fog may continue near Lake Superior and just over the hill in the Duluth area through the day. More dense fog will be possible tonight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore
